ValidationRule.description: Checks picklist value and makes field required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Category__c, 'HIPAA Breach'), RecordType.Name = 'Compliance Case', ISBLANK( Date_of_Breach_Occurence__c), NOT (ISBLANK( Type_Of_Breach_List__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: HIPAA Breach has been selected, please fill in 'Date of Breach' value.
